data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Long An, Vietnam.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Long An, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 29,775 believers in Long An to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Long An, Vietnam.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Long An, Vietnam.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Long An, Vietnam.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 1,376,600 people living in the state of Long An.
the state of Long An has (about) 29,775 people who know Jesus, 110,421 people who know about him culturally, and 1,236,405 people who are far from Jesus.
Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Long An.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.
